statements: SELECT * FROM workshops;
SELECT workshop_name, workshop_location FROM workshops ORDER BY workshop_date DESC;
SELECT workshop_name, workshop_instructor FROM workshops WHERE workshop_location = 'New York';
SELECT * FROM workshops WHERE workshop_instructor LIKE '%Smith%';
SELECT workshop_name, workshop_date FROM workshops WHERE workshop_location = 'Los Angeles' ORDER BY workshop_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM workshops WHERE workshop_name = 'Workshop A';
SELECT workshop_name, workshop_date FROM workshops WHERE workshop_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT workshop_name, workshop_location FROM workshops WHERE workshop_location IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM workshops ORDER BY workshop_date DESC;
SELECT workshop_id, workshop_name, workshop_instructor FROM workshops WHERE workshop_instructor LIKE '%Alice%' ORDER BY workshop_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM music_workshops;
SELECT workshop_name, workshop_location FROM music_workshops;
SELECT workshop_name, workshop_date, workshop_location FROM music_workshops WHERE workshop_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT workshop_location, workshop_name, workshop_date FROM music_workshops WHERE workshop_location = 'New York';

SELECT workshop_name, workshop_date FROM music_workshops
